Key Arguments: The legislation gives too much power to the government or corporations to decide what is misinformation or disinformation.
It restricts freedom of speech and the ability to decide personal truth.
The government or corporations are fallible and should not have the authority to control information.
Notable Quotes: I will decide what is the truth for me and most other people will too.
This is too much power and a restriction of freedom for a fallible Government or corporation to have and decide for a Nation.
